instructions: # Gamma World 2e Character SheetThis sheet has both an area for PC, Monsters and robots that is switchable via a tab at the top left of the sheet.  NPC and Robot sheets are still in progress.## Player Sheets* All of the roll buttons (shown as a d20 dice) have roll templates.* Attack rolls show the AC hit## Monster Sheet* All of the roll buttons have roll templates and many of them go to the GM* In sheet ability to create non-player creature mutations ## Modified from Metamorphosis Alpha 1e character sheet by Amanda the Amazon.## Current Version: 0.8
